definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare

sentences.english: That fire destroyed 38,000 acres and 21 homes.
sentences.chinese: 火火灾造成了3万8千英亩土地和21户住宅的损失。

sentences.english: they grazed their cattle over thousands of acres of public domain.
sentences.chinese: 他们在几千英亩的公共区域放牧。

sentences.english: The shepherd has penned the sheep in the five-acre field.
sentences.chinese: 羊倌把羊圈在5英亩的地里。

sentences.english: A wind turbine requires at least an acre of property as well as other location criteria.
sentences.chinese: 一个符合标准的风流涡轮机至少需要一英亩的地方。

sentences.english: The United Nations says the figure is closer to 17 million acres.
sentences.chinese: 联合国称实际数字更接近1700万英亩。

sentences.english: Johnson built the 47-acre estate for himself in New Canaan, Connecticut.
sentences.chinese: 住宅位于康涅狄格新迦南一块占地47英亩的地块上。

sentences.english: Who knows what might be under the thousands of acres that are left?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道在剩下的几千英亩下还会有些什么？

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal itself forms the centerpiece of a 42-acre complex.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵的中心墓室错综复杂，占地42英亩。

sentences.english: The betel farms bring the farmers an earning of rupees 4 lacs an acre.
sentences.chinese: 蒌籐种植田一英亩可以帮农人带来四十万卢比的收入。

sentences.english: We all lived in a cozy ranch-style house on six acres.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在六英亩大的舒适的农场大屋。

sentences.english: The insects have chewed up 4 million acres of spruce trees.
sentences.chinese: 这些昆虫能吃掉4百万英亩的云杉树。

sentences.english: They measured off a half - acre plot for a house lot.
sentences.chinese: 他们划出一块半英亩的地皮来建造房屋。

sentences.english: The optimum density is difficult to specify in terms of trees per acre .
sentences.chinese: 很难定论究竟每英亩多少株树为最适密度。

sentences.english: The island—more than 104 acres—set him back only $1.75 million.
sentences.chinese: 虽然该岛超过104英亩，但只花了他175万美元。

sentences.english: He spent holidays at the 300-acre estate of his aunt and uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他在叔叔和婶婶的300英亩庄园里度过许多假日。

sentences.english: Let's say you purchase a worn-out 100-acre farm in Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 比如说你在密歇根购买了一块100英亩荒废的农田。

definition: square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)
mile (unit of length equal to 1.609 km)

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)
